entries.m25t: Don't Make Them Like They Used To
entries.m25c: Not worth much now that it's broken, hmm? I expect I can restore it to full working order. They don't make them like this any more!
entries.m25p: I hate having to ship my instrument all that way, but hardly ten folks in the galaxy can repair an instrument this old and valuable. Formerly valuable, anyway.
entries.m25o: I do a good business restoring old musical instruments. I need you to bring me a client's broken Ommni Box. I'll pay you and bill the client.
entries.m24c: I don't care what it looks like. I just hope my old aunt does, so she leaves me a nice nest-egg in her will. Thanks.
entries.m24p: Wintrium! It spent ten thousand years solidifying under the Derelkoos Desert, and now it's a beautiful natural sculpture. A lesson for us all, eh?
entries.m24o: My rich old aunt may like me better if I give her a nice gift. I've placed an order with a supplier of exotic art objects. Can I hire you to bring the order here?
entries.m23c: A Tasari crystal! What an ornament for my collection. Thank you, thank you!
entries.m23p: An unusual item. The Tasari used to perform blood sacrifices to these crystals, to forestall more meteor showers. I guess it worked.
entries.m23o: I found someone who owns a Tasari crystal. They were formed in a cataclysmic meteor shower eons ago. Can you fetch the crystal?
entries.m22c: This is a tremendous find! I'll donate it to an Imperial history museum and gain the Empire's favor. Thank you!
entries.m22p: This ancient subspace relay uses the old mytag crystal vertices. It's fragile, but the container is padded.
entries.m22o: At last my supplier has located an antique from the time of Xim the Despot. Please bring it to me, and I'll pay you well.
entries.m21c: Oh, poor Lotti! Here, take your money and go! Lotti, Lotti!
entries.m21p: The little thing died of Big Spot Sickness some time back. Here are its ashes.
entries.m21o: I'm so far from home, I desperately miss my pet voorpak! I don't trust the shipping services. Can you bring me my beloved Lotti?
entries.m20c: Thank you. This was something of a going-away present, you might say, for a former friend. Ah well.
entries.m20p: Don't open the container. Those green diamonds are valuable, and said to be beautiful, but their radiation kills you in three breaths.
entries.m20o: I need a courier to retrieve a green diamond from a late friend's estate. Can you get it?
entries.m19c: I've got it at last! Look at the light -- the light --
entries.m19p: Don't look too long at the light reflecting from the crystals. It's said to be psychologically addicting.
entries.m19o: You know Garnib crystals? Brilliant ice sculptures. I've finally purchased one, and I need you to bring it here.
entries.m18c: This is -- why, it looks like aurodium! A fabulous half-gram ingot! I'm rich! Wait, what does my investor expect to get out of this? Hmm.
entries.m18p: Documents? My client has misunderstood. Take this container back. Don't try to open it, or the contents will vaporize.
entries.m18o: An investor has found important financing for my struggling business. Will you play courier and bring the documents here?
entries.m17t: As Long as It's Bad For You
entries.m17c: Saliva? Liquefies the victim? Hmm. Say, that might work even better. Thanks!
entries.m17p: Poison? No, this is sliideptra saliva. It liquefies the victim slowly for easy ingestion. I hope my client can use it.
entries.m17o: There are poisons, and then there's the poisonous sliideptra worm of Tel IV. I've located a sample of the worm's poison. Please fetch it.
entries.m16c: I don't know why, but some folks will pay a bundle for this junk.
entries.m16p: That O-i is the terror of the spaceways, they say. I have his personal tentacle lotion here. Yes, his own lotion!
entries.m16o: The infamous Twi'lek adventurer known only as O-i is in this sector. My supplier has found something important of his. I'll pay you to bring it!
entries.m15c: Thanks! If this code should find its way back to Jabba the Hutt -- well, I expect I'd get his gratitude and a nice reward. We'll see.
entries.m15p: With this code my client can stop most of the Hutt criminal traffic in this sector. I hope so. Be careful!
entries.m15o: Messages transmitted within the Hutt criminal empire use unique codes. My source has cracked one code. Please get that data, but keep it quiet!
entries.m14c: This was the musician's last breath, caught in this container! It has religious and ritual significance in certain cultures. Thank you!
entries.m14p: This is the container that collector wants, but I don't understand. I opened it, and it was empty.
entries.m14o: A great Bith musician has passed on. I've procured some of his irreplacable memorabilia. Out here, it's worth a fortune! Can you fetch it?
entries.m13c: Hello, hello, can you hear me? Hello? Hmm. Still needs work, apparently. Thanks anyway.
entries.m13p: We're still having some range problems with this comlink. Treat it carefully, it's a prototype.
entries.m13o: Galactic communications will be revolutionized once you bring me the new prototype comlink my researchers developed offworld.
entries.m12c: I can tell you this much: If this plan works, don't invest heavily in Imperial tracking devices any time soon. That's all for now, thanks.
entries.m12p: A word to the wise: While holding this disc, you'd be well advised to avoid Imperial entanglements.
entries.m12o: Certain data, too sensitive for HoloNet transmission, has become available. I'll pay you well to be my courier.
entries.m11c: Thank you! With this information, I can expose this rampant wage-slavery and bring down the company!
entries.m11p: The stories here of the mistreatment of miners will chill your forebrain. That mining company must be stopped!
entries.m11o: An acquaintance has compiled data on a certain mining company's practices in this sector. I need that data, and I'll pay very well to get it.
entries.m10c: It warms my spirit to know that the rascal will soon be in custody. Thank you, many thanks!
entries.m10p: With this data, a good bounty hunter can track the rogue who treated that innocent female so badly.
entries.m10o: A scoundrel trifled with my sister's honor, then fled the planet. A friend has compiled a list of his secret movements. Bring it here, no matter the cost!
entries.m9c: Thank you! A thousand thanks -- and please accept this reward. I'll have the retrovirus relayed to my relative at once.
entries.m9p: This retrovirus must be kept sealed and intact until it reaches the victim. Hurry!
entries.m9o: A close relative is dying of an ailment hereditary in our line. But I've just received word of a cure, a tailored retrovirus. I beg of you, get that cure!
entries.m8c: Thanks! I'll show those fools they shouldn't take risky wagers with me. Haha!
entries.m8p: This is a multi-generational copy so the quality is not so good. But you can definitely tell that a human boy wins the race.
entries.m8o: I made a large wager that the Boonta Eve Classic podrace on Tatooine was once won by a human boy. I've located an old hologram recording of the event that proves this. Think you could pick it up for me?
entries.m7c: Thanks. I cautioned my uncle against vacationing on a system run by Hutts. I hope he learns from this experience.
entries.m7p: Citizens should be more careful with these. Haven't you ever heard of identity theft?
entries.m7o: My uncle was robbed while vacationing on Nal Hutta and needs a new Imperial identification document to return home. Could you pick up his new doc for me?
entries.m6c: Thanks to you, my father will be free again. Here is your just reward.
entries.m6p: I hope this sets that poor man free, but I wouldn't count it. The Empire doesn't like to acknowledge mistakes.
entries.m6o: My father has languished in an Imperial prison for months, falsely accused of conspiring with rebels. I finally found definitive proof of his innocence. I'm unable to travel to collect it myself. Could you help?
entries.m5c: Thank you. It's a shame when honest entrepreneurs like myself are dragged through the mud by jealous rivals. Thank goodness for troubleshooters like yourself.
entries.m5p: Tell your patron not to worry about these blackmailers any more, and that I'll expect the balance of my pay by tomorrow.
entries.m5o: I'm a legitimate business owner whose enemies have tried to use some doctored holographs to blackmail me. Please pick up the last of these phony images from a collection agent I employed recently.
entries.m4c: My deepest gratitude! Now my daughter will see the truth and be free of that ruffian for good.
entries.m4p: Some of these holographs are pretty graphic. I'd warn that poor girl before she views these.
entries.m4o: My daughter is about to make the biggest mistake of her life -- she's going to marry a criminal. But finally, I found proof of the rogue's activities. I need you to fetch some holographs and help save my daughter.
entries.m3c: Thank you so much. I'm sure these logs will satisfy the Imperial agents working on my case. I would never betray the Empire.
entries.m3p: I hope these ship logs can save my friend. I send my best wishes along.
entries.m3o: I'm under investigation for suspected Rebel activity. I'm innocent, honest, and I've identified documents that can clear my name. Please bring them at once. My life depends on it!
entries.m2c: Thank you. This has been hard enough without all my cousins squabbling over my grandfather's properties. This should settle everything.
entries.m2p: Here is the will. The encryption used should prove the document is legitimate. If there are any questions, the family should contact me.
entries.m2o: My grandfather died recently and left his will on an encrypted datadisc that only I can access. Could you pick this up for me? It's most important to my family.
entries.m1t: Like a Member of the Family
entries.m1c: It looks like a pretty standard mouse droid to me. Oh well, it's the client's money. Thanks.
entries.m1p: Here he is. Tell the technician that money is no object. I want this special little mouse droid fixed at any cost.
entries.m1o: As I'm a specialist, my services aren't cheap, so I was surprised when a customer asked me to repair a simple mouse droid. Must mean a whole lot to this client -- my bill will likely exceed the cost of the droid. Do you think you could pick it up for me?
